1328690.name: Cross the Moon Original Soundtrack
1328690.description:
The original soundtrack to Cross the Moon. Over an hour and a half of music, this score touches on funk, disco, dramatic orchestral, synthwave, ethereal pads, rock and punk, solemn pianos... everyone is here!
There are 25 tracks split across a "double album". The first album is called Moon Looks Back. The second is Moon Made Flesh.
